channel.title: Running the compile and runserve, help please
channel.description:
:o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o :o ok this is my problem, i am trying to run compile.bat and runserve.bat from testscape but it keeps telling me that it is not recognized... umm also somethimes 43594 was not found.
I need the codes for the editing of the compile and runserve.
if you really want to help email me at
underoath_55@hotmail.com so yea i need help on my server, please please please!

item.dc:creator: @rarescape rarescape
item.description:
@rarescape wrote:

Well, here, use mine…

@echo off title rarescape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

item.source: Running the compile and runserve, help please

item.title: Running the compile and runserve, help please
item.dc:creator: @rarescape rarescape
item.description:
@rarescape wrote:

Right-click Compile, and hit edit…replace the code there with this…

@echo off COLOR 08 title Rarescape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause

If that doesn’t work this…

@echo off COLOR 08 title Rarescape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" server pause

If not that, try this…

@echo off COLOR 08 title Rarescape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\java.exe" server pause

and finally, if not that or any of the others, THIS is it…

@echo off COLOR 08 title Rarescape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

I use The 1st one.

Read full topic
